code: import axios from"axios";import UserService from"./UserService";var HttpMethods={GET:'GET',POST:'POST',DELETE:'DELETE'};var _axios=axios.create();var configure=function configure(){_axios.interceptors.request.use(function(config){if(UserService.isLoggedIn()){var cb=function cb(){config.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(UserService.getToken());return Promise.resolve(config);};return UserService.updateToken(cb);}});};var getAxiosClient=function getAxiosClient(){return _axios;};var HttpService={HttpMethods:HttpMethods,configure:configure,getAxiosClient:getAxiosClient};export default HttpService;
